IRS990.MissionDesc: ADMINISTER SAFETY AND SKILLS TRAINING PROGRAMS FOR THE BENEFIT OF THE MOTION PICTURE AND TELEVISION INDUSTRY IN ACCORDANCE WITH PROVISIONS OF VARIOUS COLLECTIVE BARGAINING AGREEMENTS.
IRS990.Desc: ADMINISTER SAFETY AND SKILLS TRAINING PROGRAMS FOR THE BENEFIT OF THE MOTION PICTURE AND TELEVISION INDUSTRY IN ACCORDANCE WITH PROVISIONS OF VARIOUS COLLECTIVE BARGAINING AGREEMENTS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: Accounting principles generally accepted in the United States of America require management to evaluate tax positions taken by the TRUST and recognize a tax liability if the TRUST has taken a tax position that more likely than not would not be sustained upon examination by a tax authority. The TRUST is subject to routine audits by taxing jurisdictions; however, there are currently no audits for any tax periods in progress. PART XI AND PART XII, LINE 2D: RENTAL EXPENSE
ADMINISTER SAFETY AND SKILLS TRAINING PROGRAMS FOR THE BENEFIT OF THE MOTION PICTURE AND TELEVISION INDUSTRY IN ACCORDANCE WITH PROVISIONS OF VARIOUS COLLECTIVE BARGAINING AGREEMENTS.
THE FORM 990 is REVIEWED BY THE CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER PRIOR TO BEING FILED.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: PART VI, SECTION B, LINES 15A AND 15B:
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: Compensation rates of the officers and highest compensated employees are approved by the board of trustees.
THE TRUST'S GOVERNING AND OTHER DOCUMENTS ARE MAINTAINED AT THE TRUST OFFICE AND ARE MADE AVAILABLE AS REQUIRED BY LAW, UPON REQUEST.

THE TRUSTEES ARE EMPLOYEES OF CONTRIBUTING EMPLOYERS WHO HAVE BEEN APPOINTED BY THE ALLIANCE OF MOTION PICTURE AND TELEVISION PRODUCERS. TO SERVE ON THE BOARD OF THE ORGANIZATION. THEIR COMPENSATION information is MAINTAINED BY THEIR INDIVIDUAL EMPLOYERS.
